summary.span: 为 XPS 包序列化策略定义基类。

span.span: Defines the base class for XPS package serialization policies.

summary.span: 此类为抽象类。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打包策略类提供一些方法，用于为中的不同类型的部件获取序列化读取器和编写器 。Packaging policy classes provide methods for acquiring serialization readers and writers for different types of parts in an .

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个字符串列表，每个字符串表示一个 元素。

returns.span: 表示页的可链接目标的 对象的 。

span.span: An of objects that represent the linkable targets for a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此列表可以组合 `LinkTarget` 可插入到相应页的元素中的元素 。Use the list to compose `LinkTarget` elements that can be inserted into the element for the corresponding page. 使用以下形式，将列表中的每个字符串换行：Wrap each string in the list in markup by using the following form: `` ，其中*target name*是字符串。``, where *target name* is the string. 有关和元素的详细 `` 信息 ，请参阅该规范中的第3章 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] ：你可以在 [XPS：规范和许可证下载](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)中获取。For more information about the `` and elements, see chapter 3 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

span.span: An object that provides information about how a print job prints.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，将打印票证写入包或包的某个部件中。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, writes a print ticket to a package or to a part of the package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会验证或修改特定的指定 `printTicket` 。This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular . 如有必要，请使用 方法创建一个 特定于 并且对指定打印机有效的。If necessary, use the method to create a that is specific to the and is valid for a specified printer.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，在提交页之前执行所需的任何维护任务，例如刷新流。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs any required maintenance tasks before the page is committed, for example, flushes streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 包中关系部件的详细信息，请参阅 [开放打包约定](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) 架构的第1章。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the [Open Packaging Conventions](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
